ai_config.bots_footer: AI services are third party services; Mattermost is not responsible for output.
ai_config.bots_subtitle: Multiple AI services can be configured below.
ai_config.enable_llm_trace_help: Enable tracing of LLM requests. Outputs whole conversations to the logs.
ai_config.enable_user_restrictions_help: Global flag for all below settings.
ai_config.functions_subtitle: Choose which bot you want to be the default for each function.
ai_config.user_restrictions_subtitle: Enable restrictions to allow or not users to use AI in this instance.
ai_plugin.unconfigured: AI Plugin is not configured. Please contact your system administrator to configure the plugin.
beta_message.message: This plugin is currently in beta. To report a bug or to provide feedback, <link>create a new issue in the plugin repository</link>.
bot.botUsernameHelpText: Team members can mention this bot with this username
bot.customInstructionsPlaceholder: How would you like the AI to respond?
bot.enableVisionHelpText: Enable Vision to allow the bot to process images. Requires a compatible model.
bots.enterprise_multiple_bots_subtext: Multiple AI services is available on Enterprise plans
bots.enterprise_multiple_bots_text: Use multiple AI bots on Enterprise plans
dropdown_info.onlyVisibleToYou: Copilot posts responses in the right panel which will only be visible to you.
rhs_new_tab.ask_copilot_anything_descrip: The Copilot is here to help. Choose from the prompts below or write your own.
rhs_new_tab.pros_and_cons_prompt: Write a pros and cons list about
